headline.main: These Campers Have a Lot to Lose--and That's Their Goal

byline.original: By JUDY KLEMESRUD Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: Article on 2 camps, Loch Sheldrake, NY, that help obese children reduce; illus
docs.lead_paragraph: LOCH SHELDRAKE, N.Y.--Bum BUM da da dum, bum BUM da da dum, bum BUM da da dum, bum BAH dum ... It was 8 A.M. and after the scratchy sounds of a recorded Reveille had died away, a man's voice came over the loudspeaker at Camp Tahoe near this heart-of-the-Catskills community, 90 miles out of New York.
